title: Peg: a life to remember
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: An affectionate tribute to Peg for her children and grandchildren
description: Peg and Bryan have been trekking all over the world since 1987. Bryan recalls their travels and the great times spent with his wife, who now has Alzheimer's disease. Created as part of 'Memory's Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage' in association with Vic Health and the Alzheimer's Association.
